str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To open fully. From dia and anoigo; to open thoroughly, literally or figuratively.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Probably from the base of ginosko; the intellect, i.e. Mind; by implication, meaning.
To consider, understand, perceive. From sun and hiemi; to put together, i.e. to comprehend; by implication, to act piously.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures. A document, i.e. Holy Writ.
